name: Shotgun Wedding (Antz)
description:
My name is JTK 2.0. I am an artificial lifeform. I am getting married today. 

There are those that oppose artificial lifeforms getting married.  They have hacked my navigation system. Help me navigate to my bride who is patiently waiting for me at the church.

libGDX JAM #24 submission. Started late but put managed to put something together.

Tested on Google Chrome.  Terrain collisions wonky. Always jump down platforms.

F key will return you to full screen mode.

Models:
